item.title: Post
item.description: Hugo(Head 1) Template Files(Head 2) HTML(Head 3) Hugo uses template files to render content into HTML. Template files are a bridge between the content and presentation. Rules in the template define what content is published, where itâ€™s published to, and how it will rendered to the HTML file. The template guides the presentation by specifying the style to use.
